item.prominent.ability.thunderwrath.dama: Attacks have a 25%% chance of striking again with %d lightning damage.
item.prominent.ability.thunderwrath.warr: Being fated to the Warrior's Devotion increases its chance to 35%%.
item.prominent.ability.supernova.astral_: Invoke all of the energy of Supernova into a single point,
exploding in a lethal nova that damages all nearby enemies.
item.prominent.ability.supernova.arcane_: Charge your focus in a single target, and then strike with a powerful
sonic attack that deals physical and arcane damage.
item.prominent.ability.supernova.frost_p: Channel a rain of icicles to your closest target. If the target dies,
the channeling continues to the next closest target.
item.prominent.ability.supernova.fire_pr: Teleport behind a close enemy and strike with a flaming hit,
dealing physical and fire damage. Can be channeled.
item.prominent.ability.supernova.astral_: Your hits may resonate with extra elemental damage.
item.prominent.ability.fury_of_a_thousan: Enrage yourself, imbuing your fists with 500% attack speed
for 2 seconds. While enraged, your attacks may deal extra soulfire damage.
Requires a Fist of Fury in the off hand.
item.prominent.frostmourne: Frostmourne, Blade of the Fallen King
item.prominent.ability.frostmourne.curse: Whoever wields the Frostmourne will become the next Lich King.
Death Knight abilities deal higher damage.
item.prominent.ability.frostmourne.casti: Casts Death Knight abilities from equipped skill book.
item.prominent.ability.azhar.soul_absorp: Absorb all Broken Souls, consuming them and healing 10% of your
maximum health per broken soul stack.
item.prominent.ability.azhar.breath_of_a: Unleash the breath of A'zhar, dealing high soulfire damage on a
large cone. If you don't have a broken soul stack, you will receive continuous damage while the breath is active.
item.prominent.ability.azhar.broken_soul: Broken Souls last 5 seconds, each stack will not reset the duration.
When souls expire, you get healed 10% of your maximum health.
Attacks generate a Broken Soul, but damage you 10% of your health.
Killing an enemy will generate a Broken Soul without damaging you.
item.prominent.ability.fyralath.greater_: Set in flames your target and give yourself resistance for
4 seconds. Attacks have a chance to extend the duration.
Swing Fyr'alath rapidly to heat the air and throw flaming
Invoke a rain of meteors that will fall upon your target
and deal fire damage to all close enemies.
item.prominent.ability.fyralath.fiery_co: Fyr'alath can invoke improved fire spells that have instant
cast times, more damage and improved effects.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.cinderston: This staff has the ability to evolve into something greater when infused with power.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.arcane_inf: This staff has evolved with the raw power of the Arcane. Known now as Al Na'ir, The Bright Star.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.fire_infus: This staff has evolved with the raw power of Fire. Known now as Adassil, The Scorched Tree.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.frost_infu: This staff has evolved with the raw frozen power. Known now as Khaz'el, The Frozen Destiny.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.holy_infus: This staff has evolved with the raw power of Holy. Known now as Ad'anel, Secret of Ain.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.astral_inf: This staff has evolved with the raw astral powers. Known now as Singularity, A Star's Rebirth.
item.prominent.ability.ekavar.casting_in: Casts Arcane, Fire, Frost and Holy abilities from equipped Spell Book.
item.prominent.ability.orion.cosmic_infl: Arrows get infused by Orion's cosmic power, increasing their velocity by 25%
item.prominent.ability.orion.pledge_to_s: Pledge to a star using Orion's Upgrade Tree, unlocking new effects.
item.prominent.ability.orion.algjebbah_g: Heal yourself for 5% of your maximum health when you use an ability from any archery spellbook.
item.prominent.ability.orion.mintaka_gif: Increase the damage dealt by your abilities from the Mintaka's Fright spellbook.
item.prominent.ability.orion.alnilam_gif: Increase the damage dealt by your abilities from the Alnilam's Sight spellbook.
item.prominent.ability.orion.alnitak_gif: Increase the damage dealt by your abilities from the Alnitak's Might spellbook.
item.prominent.ability.orion.pledge_to_n: Pledge to a Nebula using Orion's Upgrade Tree, unlocking new effects.
item.prominent.ability.orion.horsehead_g: Orion and your bow abilities deal +20% damage while mounted on a Horse or Nightmare mythic mount.
item.prominent.ability.orion.strength_of: Your bond with Orion is strengthened, making the trajectory speed of arrows fired with it be +10% faster, in exchange of -10% slower drawing speed.
item.prominent.ability.orion.casper_ghos: The Focus Zone passive can now also be applied when using the third ability of any archer spellbook.
item.prominent.vaazkar: Vaazkar, Protector of the Molten City
item.prominent.ability.vaazkar.wall_of_f: After 3 seconds of shielding with Vaazkar, surround yourself with flames,
dealing 3% of your Maximum Health as fire damage to nearby enemies per second.
Lasts 10 seconds, then goes on cooldown for 15 seconds.
item.prominent.ability.vaazkar.instant_f: After shielding with Vaazkar, surround yourself with flames, dealing 3%
of your Maximum Health as fire damage to nearby enemies per second.
Enemies get taunted every time they're damaged by it.
Lasts up to 10 seconds, then goes on cooldown for 10 seconds.
item.prominent.ability.vaazkar.protectiv: After 3 seconds of shielding with Vaazkar, surround yourself with flames,
healing nearby players for 3% of your maximum health every 2 seconds.
Lasts up to 10 seconds, then goes on cooldown for 15 seconds.
item.prominent.ability.vaazkar.firestorm: After 3 seconds of shielding with Vaazkar, surround yourself with flames,
dealing 5% of your Maximum Health as fire damage to nearby enemies per second.
Lasts up to 10 seconds, then goes on cooldown for 15 seconds.
Attacks grant a stack of haste, up to 5 stacks, once 5
stacks are reached, feed your power to Gh'aj.
item.prominent.ability.ghaj.feed_me.dama: Deal %d §fꦗ§r corruption damage to your target, then
item.prominent.ability.ghaj.feed_me.desc: gain a stack of Voidcloak, increasing your attack speed
and reducing incoming damage by 10% up to 5 stacks.
item.prominent.ability.ghaj.dagger_maste: Gh'aj infuses a dagger in your off hand, unlocking a new
combo set of 6 attacks that deal 50% more damage.
dialogue.ghaj.1: You are mine, feed me, empower me
dialogue.ghaj.2: You are nothing without me, you are weak
dialogue.ghaj.3: Kill them all, bring me a feast
dialogue.ghaj.5: How are you even still alive? You are so fragile without me...
dialogue.ghaj.7: Accept me into your mind, let me take control
dialogue.ghaj.8: We could do great things together, just let me in
dialogue.ghaj.9: Don't listen to him, listen to me, I am the only one who can save you
item.prominent.ashedar_essence: Essence of Ash'edar, the Cosmic Twins
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.sunstrike: Focus a shockwave of pure solar power, dealing fire damage to all enemies in a frontal cone.
Deals double damage while affected by Solar Eclipse.
Heals you the damaged amount while affected by Lunar Eclipse.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.prominenc: Unleash the true power of Ash, erupting fire damage in a large area.
Sets targets on fire and blinds them while affected by Solar Eclipse.
Deals double damage to stunned enemies while affected by Lunar Eclipse.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.solar_ecl: Increases damage done by Ash'edar by 10%. Applies for 10 seconds.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.darkening: Swirls the inner arcane power of Edar, dealing arcane damage all around you.
Extends the duration of your current Eclipse by 2 seconds.
Heals you the damaged amount while affected by Lunar Eclipse.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.moonlight: Unleash a powerful nova of pure moonlight, damaging and stunning all enemies.
Deals double damage while affected by Solar Eclipse.
Stun duration is increased while affected by Lunar Eclipse.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.lunar_ecl: Increases attack and movement speed by 10%. Applies for 10 seconds.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.eclipse_c: Solar and Lunar Eclipses share their cooldown.
item.prominent.ability.ashedar.astral_at: When dual wielding along with its twin, melee attacks deal double damage. Available spells will change depending on which blade is in your main hand.
item.prominent.ability.apophis.smite.des: Smite enemies in front of you in an area, dealing high physical
and holy damage to nearby enemies, with higher damage against undead.
item.prominent.ability.apocalypse.lore: A weapon born from Eternity, shall only be wielded by Death.
item.prominent.illusion_of_fury_of_a_tho: Illusion of Fury of a Thousand Fists
spell.prominent.supernova.name: Astral Burst
spell.prominent.supernova.description: Invoke all of the energy of Supernova into a single point, exploding in a lethal nova that deals arcane damage to all nearby enemies.
spell.prominent.rage.name: Enrage
spell.prominent.rage.description: Unleash your inner rage, increasing your attack speed by 500% for a short duration. Requires a fist of fury and the fist of a thousand furies.
item.prominent.ability.skillet.lore: "Looks like a normal pan, but the best foods were cooked on it."
item.prominent.ability.skillet.granny_wr: Attacks burn the target for 5 seconds and fill your hunger by 1.
item.prominent.health_flask.tooltip: Restores 10% Maximum Health and grants Regeneration IV for 5 seconds.
stat.prominent.hck_fury_of_a_thousand_fi: Mythic Challenges Completed with Fury of a Thousand Fists
item.prominent.xmog_ancient_royal_great_: Illusion of the Ancient Royal Great Sword
item.prominent.xmog_aquatic_sacred_blade: Illusion of the Aquatic Sacred Blade
item.prominent.xmog_divine_great_axe: Illusion of the Divine Great Axe
item.prominent.xmog_forest_guardian_glai: Illusion of the Glaive of the Forest Guardian
item.prominent.xmog_sacred_tree_blade: Illusion of the Sacred Tree Blade
